snippet: Many Tea Party supporters said that while they would work to help Mitt Romney defeat President Obama, their real passion was for electing small-government conservatives further down the ballot.
abstract: Many Tea Party supporters said that while they would work to help Mitt Romney defeat President Obama, their real passion was for electing small-government conservatives further down the ballot.

headline.main: Tea Party Movement Takes the Long View
headline.print_headline: Political Memo: For Tea Party, Priority Is an Enduring Future, Not Just a Candidacy
